title: Requires milk produced by cows fed, injected with or administered growth hormones to be so labeled
summary: Requires milk which is produced by cows which are fed, injected with or in any way administered growth hormones to be labeled "This milk was produced by cows administered growth hormones".
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1897

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WRIGHT -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Aging

       AN  ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requir-
         ing milk produced by cows fed, injected with  or  administered  growth
         hormones to be labeled as such

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The agriculture and markets law is amended by adding a  new
    2  section 64 to read as follows:
    3    S  64.  MILK  PRODUCED BY COWS ADMINISTERED GROWTH HORMONES. NO PERSON
    4  PACKAGING MILK WITH INTENT TO SELL SUCH PRODUCT,  WHEN  ANY  PORTION  OF
    5  SUCH MILK WAS PRODUCED BY COWS FED, INJECTED WITH OR IN ANY WAY ADMINIS-
    6  TERED  ANY  GROWTH HORMONE, SHALL SELL SUCH MILK UNLESS THE PACKAGING IS
    7  LABELED, "THIS MILK WAS PRODUCED BY COWS ADMINISTERED GROWTH HORMONES".
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect on the thirtieth day  after  it  shall
    9  have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05679-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring milk produced by cows fed, injected with or administered growth hormones to be labeled as such
